name: google-java-format
description: Formats source code using the google-java-format tool. This version of the plugin uses version 1.9 of the tool.
notes:
<dl>
      <dt>1.9.0.0</dt>
      <dd>Updated to use google-java-format 1.9.</dd><dd>
      </dd><dt>1.8.0.1</dt>
      <dd>Fixed support for 2020.2 IDEs.</dd><dd>
      </dd><dt>1.8.0.0</dt>
      <dd>Updated to use google-java-format 1.8.</dd><dd>
      </dd><dt>1.7.0.5</dt>
      <dd>Added a version for 2020.1+ IDEs.</dd>
      <dt>1.7.0.4</dt>
      <dd>Marked the plugin as being incompatible with 2020.1+ IDEs.</dd>
      <dt>1.7.0.3</dt>
      <dd>Fixed the plugin on 2019.3 IDEs.</dd>
      <dt>1.7.0.2</dt>
      <dd>Added support for all IDEs after 2017.3.</dd>
      <dt>1.7.0.1</dt>
      <dd>Added support for 2019.1 IDEs.</dd>
      <dt>1.7.0.0</dt>
      <dd>Upgraded to google-java-format 1.7.</dd>
    </dl>
